brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is

        1. to estimate the incidence of seizure in the general population  and stratified by
           epilepsy status

        2. To estimate the  relative risk of seizure associated with use of proton pump inhibitors
           and histamine 2 receptor antagonist and stratified by epilepsy status

clinical_study.brief_title: Acid Suppressing Drug Seizure Epidemiology Study

detailed_description.textblock:
A cohort study with a nested case control analysis on the association between
      acid-suppressing drugs and seizures using THIN database in the UK

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Primary care physician for at least 2 years.

          -  Computerized prescription history of at least 1 year.

          -  Patients will have to be free of acid-suppressing drugs (PPI or H2RA) for at least
             one year.

          -  No diagnosis of cancer.

          -  No alcohol abuse or alcohol-related disease- No drug abuse.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with at least 1 prescription of PPI or H2RA in the year prior to start date.

          -  Cancer before start date.

          -  Alcohol abuse or alcohol-related disease before start date.

          -  Drug abuse before start date.

study_pop.textblock:
All individuals aged 20-84 years from 1 January 2005 to 31 December 2011, who have been
        enrolled with their primary care physician for at least 2 years and have a computerized
        prescription history of at least 1 year. Patients will have to be free of acid-suppressing
        drugs (PPI or H2RA) for at least one year, and never have a diagnosis of cancer, alcohol
        abuse or alcohol-related disease, or drug abuse.

intervention.description: Patients newly prescribed PPI and H2RA, respectively

clinical_study.official_title: A Cohort Study With a Nested Case Control Analysis on the Association Between Acid-suppressing Drugs and Seizures Using THIN Database in the UK

overall_official.affiliation: CEIFE (Centro Espanol de Investigacion Farmacoepidemiologica - Spanish Centre for Pharmacoepidemiologic Research )

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of seizure in the general population and stratified by epilepsy status.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the study period 1 January 2005-31 December 2011, an expected average of 3 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Follow-up of safety outcomes:  First recorded entry of seizure.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed for the duration of the study period 1 January 2005-31 December 2011, an expected average of 3 years.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
